```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(DPH)
```

Here is a simulated example which shows you how to use DPH:

```{r example}
sim_data
```

Fit standard DPH model:

```{r model}
dph_fit0(
  time = sim_data$time, 
  status = sim_data$status, 
  predictors = sim_data[, -(1:2)])
```
